title: Permutation Calculator: nPr, With & Without Repetition | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Permutation without repetition: \(P(n, r) = \frac{n!}{(n - r)!}\) Total permutations of n distinct objects: \(n! = n \times (n-1) \times \dots \times 1\) Permutation with repetition: \(P(n, r) = n^r\) This calculator uses exactly these formulas.
